About the Creator

Welcome to my creative realm. I'm Paul Middleton, a multi-disciplinary creative professional specializing in visual storytelling across multiple mediums. From directing compelling narratives to crafting stunning visuals, I bring stories to life through the lens of medieval-inspired artistry and modern technical excellence.

When not creating, you'll find me skateboarding through city streets, experimenting in the kitchen, tending to my garden, or diving deep into virtual worlds. These passions fuel my creative vision and bring authenticity to every project.
